title: Request a Workshop | Wellness Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents:
Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Wellness Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Wellness Center      Wellness Center   Main Menu    About Us           Need Help?    FAQs    Contact         News & Events           Calendar of Events    Annual Events    Past Events         Resources & Services           Pop-Up Pantry    Individual Consultations    Homeless Assistance    Wellness Supplies    Stress Relief Place    Sexual Health/ Healthy Relationships    Literature Library & Videos    Alcohol & e-CHUG    Studying    Conflict Management    Sleep         Workshops           Workshops Offered    Request a Workshop         Policies           Alcohol and Other Drug    Smoke Free Campus Policy and Fine Payment    Student Disciplinary Policy    Cannabis Policy          Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Wellness Center       Request a Workshop      View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Wellness Center    Workshops    Request a Workshop        Request a Workshop  IMPORTANT   Please submit workshop requests at least (2) weeks in advance of your event date.  Please help us to keep our student presenters safe by scheduling workshops no later than 5 pm  At this time, workshops are only available to students affiliated with the University of Illinois system  In order to request a workshop, there must be a minimum of 12 expected attendees  **To respect the academic success of our student staff we will not be accepting workshops 2 weeks prior to Finals   WORKSHOP GUIDELINES   Audience: Registered UIC students  A reserved room/classroom (quiet with no through traffic)  A dedicated audience of UIC students (students who are regularly convened to attend an organizational meeting or class session)  Required audience size:12 students or more  Technology in the room: laptop, screen, and data projector       Workshop Request   Disclaimer * Required   Yes, I understand  I have read the above "Important" information about the workshop request and the other resources before submitting this form. I understand that as a requestor I am responsible for reserving a room with technological equipment such as a projector, a screen, and a laptop/computer linked to the projector. 

I also agree to notify the presenter in case of cancelation and or any other workshop changes Requestor Name * Required    First     Last   Requestor Phone Number Requestor Email * Required   Organization * Required Workshop Title (Please Refer to "Workshop Offered" List) * Required Date - must be mm/dd/yyyy format * Required   Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY   Time * Required    :  HH     MM    AM/PM  AM  PM    Workshop Location (Building and Room #) * Required Anticipated # of People (Minimum of 12 Attendees) * Required Who is This Workshop For? * Required Undergraduate Students Graduate Students Please Select Which Option Best Applies to Workshop/ Workshop Attendees * Required Campus Housing Fraternity and Sorority Life Class Student Org CAPTCHA Phone This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.              This iframe contains the logic required to handle Ajax powered Gravity Forms.          Workshops           Workshops Offered    Request a Workshop
